subSubSection.paragraph: Harpagonella palmeri A. Gray var. arizonica I.M. Johnston. Contr. Gray Herb. 73: 75. 1924. TYPE: U.S.A. Arizona: "plains, Lowell," W.F. Parish 162 , May 3, 1884, (holotype: GH! digital image).
